array1.title: Practical
array1.desc: Shows that the car booking process on this website is very simple and hassle-free.

array2.title: Fast
array2.desc: The process of searching and booking a car can be done in just seconds.

array3.title: Transparent
array3.desc: Car information and booking status are displayed honestly & in real-time.

array4.title: Flexible
array4.desc: Users can book anytime, according to their needs.

array5.title: Comprehensive
array5.desc: The car catalog is available with clear information and attractive images.
